formName: C118 section 1 part 2 apply for Authorised Economic Operator

fields.infoText: Your trader identification number is the same as your Economic Operator Registration and Identification (EORI) number

fields.label: Why am I being asked for this?
fields.infoText: We use your EORI number to link together all 7 forms for your application

fields.label: EORI Number
Member states country codes
fields.infoText:
Find the required [member state country codes](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/uk-trade-tariff-country-and-currency-codes/uk-trade-tariff-country-and-currency-codes#a "Member state country codes") here 

 You will need to press back in your browser to get back to this form

fields.helpText: Enter your country code, for example GB, followed by your 12 numerical digit EORI number
fields.errorMessage: Input your country code and EORI number

sections.title: Have you completed all the forms for your application?

fields.infoText:
You need to send all relevant forms within a 24 hour period, or your application will be rejected.

If you are not ready to send all your forms within this period, you need to save and come back later.

fields.label: What do I need to complete?
fields.infoText:
If you are applying for AEO status customs simplification (AEOC) you need to complete the following forms:

C117

C118-1-1

C118-1-2

C118-1-3

C118-2

C118-3-1

C118-3-2

C118-4

C118-5


If you are applying for AEO status security and safety (AEOS) you need to complete the following forms:

C117

C118-1-1

C118-1-2

C118-1-3

C118-2

C118-3-1

C118-3-2

C118-4

C118-6-1

C118-6-2

C118-6-3

C118-6-4


If you are applying for both you need to complete the following forms:

C117

C118-1-1

C118-1-2

C118-1-3

C118-2

C118-3-1

C118-3-2

C118-4

C118-5

C118-6-1

C118-6-2

C118-6-3

C118-6-4

fields.label: Provide details below of who is signing the declaration
Full name
Job title
fields.helpText: For example, director, financial controller or secretary

fields.label: Email address
fields.helpText: We will send an email to this address to confirm weâ€™ve received this form

fields.infoText: By sending this form, you declare that the information you have provided is true and complete.
This is your last opportunity to print or save a PDF copy of your submitted form.

You need to send us all of the relevant forms within **24 hours**.

If you do not send us these details in time, you will need to start a new application.

If you have sent us all the relevant details, we will tell you within 60 calendar days if your application has been successful.

If your application is unsuccessful we will tell you why.

**If you need help**

[Check the guidance](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/authorised-economic-operator-certification) to find out: 
- what you need to do while we process your application
- how to make changes to your application
- how to contact HMRC about your application
